overview:
Pamela graduated with a Masters degree in Business Administration (MBA) from The Wharton School (The University of Pennsylvania) after which she began a career in strategy consulting. She initially worked for Towers Perrin in New York City where she quickly progressed to the Partner Level. Though she worked in a variety of industries including financial services, oil and gas, and telecommunications, she was instrumental in establishing the firmâ€™s pharmaceutical industry practice.

Pamela departed the pharmaceutical consulting industry to begin a collaboration in the finance industry that married her technical roots with her analytical skills. She now runs a successful online business that proudly serves retail and institutional clients around the world.
